plays.text: Penalty to Chris Therien 2 minutes for Boarding Jay Pandolfo
Penalty to Bobby Holik 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Roman Cechmanek
Penalty to Scott Stevens 2 minutes for Tripping Mark Recchi
Penalty to Ruslan Fedotenko 2 minutes for Boarding Colin White
Goal scored by Simon Gagne assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Rick Tocchet
